items.title: Apple fans spent $1,199 on an iPhone â€” Bitcoin buyers turned it into a MacBook
items.description: If you purchased Bitcoin instead of Apple's iconic iPhone 16 Pro Max on its launch day, you would be able to purchase a MacBook Pro with M4 chip today.

items.title: Survey Shows Pent-Up Demand For New Apple iPhones
items.description: A survey of U.S. consumers in March indicates surprisingly strong demand for iPhone upgrades despite "a challenging fundamental backdrop."

items.title: Apple Rebuilds Siri Team With Vision Pro Veterans After Project Setbacks
items.description: Apple brings in new faces from Vision Pro team to reboot Siri, following project delays and mounting competitive pressure

items.title: Bessent Calls U.S.-China Trade War Unsustainable; S&P 500 Bounces
items.description: The U.S.-China standoff over tariffs is unsustainable and likely to de-escalate, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said.
